content.detailedDescription:
Two star like images,,facing east in chicago...Stationary..Observed 1 hour
not here the next day..I know of  weather inversions,, ...Planets...Mirages...Reflections and such......This was none of these.
be interesting to know if anyone else reported this.
not a ufo...Just strange lights,

thank you

roy arvio
content.summary: No landing

content.detailedDescription:
First of all it is important to say that i had already documented this event with you approximately 10 or so years ago.  a friend of mine said that he had seen the same phenomenon. i was in contact with one of your agents and they asked me if i knew anyone else who had experienced it and i told them that my friend did but he did not want to be contacted.  mufon contacted him and he was very annoyed with me so i ceased communication with mufon as i felt betrayed by you.  with that to say, my interest and unpersuadable conviction that intelligent life exists, the event has perpetually haunted me as to what it is i witnessed. a number of years later mufon had a special documentary on television and mentioned this event which confirmed to me that it occurred.  i am looking for detail of what i saw approximately 40 years ago.  although the date and time are definitely clouded, the imagery is as vivid as when i saw it.

that night in question i had taken my red 12 speed schauff racing bike out for one of my "tour the island" rides.  it was customary for me to go for a ride in no specific direction or destination.  i would try to lose myself in the city to discover it.  between 20:00 and 21:00hrs i left my house which was essentially situated at the mid-point of the island of montreal and headed east.  about a half hour into the ride i was fairly north east of the island.  when i was about at viau and jean talon intersection, i looked over my right shoulder and noticed a bright glow coming from the south west of me, however still in the east of the city.

the geography of montreal had me slightly elevated to the lighted area.  since montreal is quite the festival city in the summer i presumed it was one of the less popular festivals in the east of the city.  i thought i would go participate in this one as i have never been to a festival in this part of the city, but first i wanted to ride a bit more east before heading over.  however the brightness of the light intrigued me because i was wondering who and where in the east of the city would employ such a bright search or spot light.  it bother me so much so that i decided to stop my eastern journey and proceed to where i believed the incident was taking place.

i had only one place in mind that i thought it could be and stared heading south to notre dame (the longest street in montreal which runs along the st-lawrence sea-way in the east.) once i reached the street i headed back west towards the park i believed the light was emanating from.  as i approached that park the light seemed to be further away than i expected, which really stated to bewilder me.  i specifically remember thinking how could a light be that bright be so far away?  once i got to the park i rode out to the shores and noticed that the light was as bright but definitely further in the west than made sense. from the curvature of the shore line it seemed to be coming from downtown.  i immediately thought how could i see lights emanating downtown from the point of where i first noticed them? this is over 25 km; however it made sense that such lights if they exists would be used downtown.  i was still puzzled because i knew there was no festivals that night in montreal so why was the area so brightly lit up?

i pedaled harder and faster because i was so pumped up on adrenalin and i did not want to miss the festival, but in the back of my mind i was just wondering what technology they were using to emit such a brilliant light.

since i had concluded that it was coming from downtown, i then presumed it was coming from place ville marie because this was often a festival venue, so i headed directly there.  when i got there i rode around but then realized that it was not there but essentially a couple of blocks away to the south over the chateau champlain hotel.  i thought this strange because nothing ever happens on their grounds. when i got there which was no more than 60 seconds i looked up and there was that light and steady dull glow in the sky.  i rode around the building a few times looking for lights from the ground shinning upward, but there were absolutely none.  the light was shining downward to the ground.  it covered the entire area and i had no explanation of why.  the light was coming from above the building.  i just kept looking up and riding around the building trying to figure out what i was seeing.  i noticed people passing by periodically and pointing to the sky but not more than that and they seemed not to be too concerned, just puzzled, then continued on their ways.

approximately after a half hour of studying the light and trying to explain it to myself, i started heading north along peel street to go home but i kept looking back as i could not explain what i was seeing.  the light never moved or changed its intensity.  it was like an oval / roundish halo of light which hovered there without sound or motion.

as i got closer to home i noticed that the intensity of the light had diminished some and again i found this strange because my house in relation to downtown was considerably closer, (less than 4 km) than where i had originally noticed it.  i could only conclude that the light was now in motion vertically and or horizontally.  i have no idea of which direction it seemed to have moved.

although it would be considered as a mass sighting, i was alone for the entire event.
content.summary: I was ne of the city island when i noticed the lights sw.

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside to see if there were any fireworks going on.  many folks blow them up on new years eve.  i could see a few "displays" from my back yard. some to the south where the center of town is.  i also saw a few smaller ones  generated from the next neighborhood north of mine.  these fireworks were plainly visible from my backyard and were less than a mile away.
 
    while scanning the sky i noticed what i first thought was a helicopter heading in my general direction. it moved from the ne to the sw. then it stopped and just "sat" above the hill just east of my backyard. it was totally silent as opposed to the helicopters which fly over.  as i watched it i could make out 3 lights. it seemed there were 2 on the top and the third directly below the other two. like 2 at the shoulders and 1 and the base between the feet.  ( if you will....)

    as my excitement grew i thought about going inside and getting a camera. but i did not want to stop watching it long enough to run in. after a few minutes ( i estimate less than 5 ....) i decided to go in a get a camera. the lights slowly stared to move away and up.  i watched as they disappeared into the overcast.   !!!!!

    these lights were definitely not aviation navigation lights. they did not flash nor pulse.  and they were not green or red.  they were amber/goldish in color. 

     the edge of the lights were a bit fuzzy but clear enough to distinguish that there were 3 separate lights.

    every helicopter that flies near my house makes that noise.  we have several different types currently flying above my apartment.  our "mercy/life flight" is an aercopter/eurocopter as400? i see it often.It makes a noise.  i have also seen blackhawks and huey's in our airspace.  they are very loud.  

      what i saw that night was not a helicopter ...Unless it was one of those "very special stealth" versions.  ( i say no to that! )
content.summary: I thought it was a helicopter. it wasn't! amber/gold lights slowed to a silent hover then climbed up through the clouds.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my homes drive way enjoying the beautiful clear and calm winter evening sky.                        the 6 lights moving silently from north to south on my field of view  what i also noticed was a intermittent flashing white light that seemed to be following the main object about  5" back of it in my perspective. note: it quit flashing when it made its turn but the 6 flame colored lights were visible until it faded from view to the right of the setting moon. there was absolutely no noise, vibration or sound of any kind being emitted that is what was so striking about the event.
content.summary: I was standing in my drive when i saw 6 flame colored moving left to right at approximately  300 knots and slowe and turned to the www and glided slowly away until it disappeared from view under and to the right of the setting moon.

content.detailedDescription: I went to liberty island on october 25th 2015. i was on the base of the statue of liberty taking pictures of new york. the skies were clear and it was cold. i used two different cameras to take pictures. when reviewing the pictures back at the hotel i observed a large cassette like object hovering over the bay and city. every other picture i noticed the object getting further and further from me. at the moment of taking the pictures nothing was observed. there was no parachutes no airplanes or no other activities other then the police patrolling the bay.
content.summary: Taking pics or new york clear cold skies. didn't see anything. pics revealed cassette like ufo hovering.

content.detailedDescription: This was sometime back me and my mother and step dad seen the object coming down at a high ate of speed it was a clear day and was so close i could see the mechanical rings ,the rings were very large in size and in diameter also the inert gas that filled the void in between each one also i could see the rings move somewhat while the craft was in hover mode it made no sound but it was mechanical and approximately the size of four football fields .It was hovering over a field which included me and my parents along with some cattle and a pond near the road we were stopped on, there are other details but to many to mention it had a profound outcome on my life i have searched for someone else that may have seen this type craft that is why i decided to report this this was not one of those nite time events this was clear and complete to look at daytime and perfect weather only 20 feet over my head if this ufo would got any closer it would have impacted with our vehicle if anyone has some knowledge of this type siteing please let me know and we can share the rest of the story
content.summary: Ufo had solid metal rings underneath the craft with a gas/smoke seperating them

content.detailedDescription: But the object flew to fast away, faster than any aircraft i have seen. it then hovered a distance away from me but where i could see its light (this was around november 2015). then last night around 3:30am i was going down a road on my paper route pulled into a driveway to turn around i came up the street and heard a noise looked straight above me and i saw the green and red lights and a dark blackish dome light object it hovered over my car at treetop level for a few moments then i tried to take a photo but my cell phone didn't want to work that's when it flew on a little distance away but i could still see its lights hovering for the next two hours. when it took off it made a loud rumbling almost like an mixture between a helicopter and an airplane. it bigger than a helicopter,also way faster than i thought any plane could go. i felt curious the entire time i saw it i wanted to follow it which was werid i'm normally. very paranoid over everything but i felt like i wanted to go towards it.  definitely a werid experience!!
content.summary: I have seen this think twice now, the 1st time i was doing my paper route when i hurt a loud noise like an airplane taking off i looked over and saw a round in shape object with blue and red lights coming up from behind a house i tried to get a picture

content.detailedDescription: From my garden 20 km north of brisbane i was watching an approaching cloud cell that looked like it might produce lightning as im an avid storm chaser. i was disappointed to see the cloud rapidly disperse as it approached. then to my west and farther north than the cloud i was observing i saw the object just hovering. at first i thought it was a lenticular cloud but it was too small and too solid looking and it didn't fit in with the surrounding cloud. the sun was just dipping below the horizon rapidly and as the seconds passed the object become more silhouetted against the orangey sky. i told my wife and mother in law and they both sighted the object. i quickly ran to get my camera but the light was fading rapidly so it was hard to get a good focus point. at this point the object moved north slowly for a few seconds then disappeared. i don't know whether it accelerated away or disappeared where it was.
content.summary: Hovering disc that moved then disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
I saw  powerful white light in horizont, with a north-south movement, from my house at first.

the object was not the typical white and red lights flashing from helicopters or airplanes in flight.

no sound, time to lose visibility from my position 1 minute.

when five minutes later i went down to the street, a plane was passing right by the position in which the object was before.

i live near an airfield which is only active aircraft with sunlight (at the time of the sighting was night) and only operates in night helicopter and sometimes helicopters can carry a flashlight with a powerful white light on.  i saw was not the case was different. the light i saw was different. the light did not emit a light beam of a spotlight & by the distance to the object made no sound.
content.summary: A powerful white light in horizont, with a north-south movement.

content.detailedDescription: I shot a video of a ufo. i was on number 10 mountain. that would be in gowen oklahoma. i was on cliff edge facing south over looking hartshorne oklahoma and i noticed this object just sitting still and it started turning these lights on and off. it was perfectly quiet and if it would have not turned lights on. i would have never knew it was there. it had these different color lights underneath it. it was red green blue yellow and they were chasing lights going in a circle. the it had a big spotlight in center. then it turned on more lights and it stayed like this for several hours. it was just doing a light show. then almost daylight it took off in a blink of an eye. it left out of there so fast that it left like a comit tail. it was traveling like speed of light fast. i have the video on youtube under ufo over hartshorne oklahoma.
content.summary: It was hoovering and doing a light show.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving east along a major roadway in portland. i saw three bright lights in a triangle shape at about 65 degrees above the horizon traveling west. initially i thought the object might be a plane. however, i realized that if it were a plane it was very very low, flying below the low cloud cover, and that it was operating directly over a major road. it seemed like a very unusual place for a plane to be flying under normal circumstances. my wife thought it was a drone, but to me it seemed too large to be a remote controlled craft. i watched the object travel over the car. it had three white lights that did not blink and appeared to be large and round. the object appeared to have a triangular metallic structure but i was unable to make it out distinctly because the bright white lights on the bottom of the object and the rain on the windshield of my car. after the object passed over the car i felt it was strange enough that it deserved a second look. i pulled onto a side street and turned around. when i got back on the street where i saw the object it could no longer be seen. i have no idea what it was, but it was strange enough that i thought it warranted a report here to see if anyone else saw it and can confirm what it was.
content.summary: Triangle shaped object w/ three bright white lights

content.detailedDescription: You must get many attention seekers and mentally ill contact you but i still cannot comprehend what happened over that field.Lights approached thought helicopter but veered at crazy speed hovered began to descend right near me.Humming i felt an electrical charge hairs and goose bumps.This thing landed about 2 bus lengths away.Tried to run but paralysed time seemed to jump as next thing what you call a grey stood 2 feet from me.I couldnt look away from eyes.Vision in head telling me they were from our past were inhabitants native to earth time travelling told of their once great civilisations.I felt aggressive and scared next memory it takes off then zip away.Had no memory of creaure getting in or out of craft.Have told nobody.Next day face and hands red like bad sunburn felt sick.I never drink and since i sleep badly.What to do!!!???
content.summary: See explanation below

content.detailedDescription: Looking out my window at the city and a very bright light/ orb floating my above didn't move probably 1000 or more feet in the air at a little more then a mile distance away. it got brighter then an airplane and it didn't move it just hovered and then a minute later vanished at a blink of an eye.
content.summary: Bright light and then disappeared after a minute

content.detailedDescription:
Was letting my dog out at 10 pm and saw a bright light. at first i thought it may be a planet but then noticed it was moving.  as it came towards me i could see a high arch of light off of the top.  there was a plane in the far distance and very distinctly different lighting from this object.
as it continued west i saw blinking colored lights on the bottom/ two separate rows on right and left sides and also red lights between.  lights were sometimes blinking in sequence and sometimes seemed random.  the object looked rectangular with now two high arcs of multicolored rainbow light coming from the top.  i continued to watch until it was to far west to see anymore.  i lost sight of it around 10:12-10:15.
content.summary: Saw bright light i the sky and thought it may be a planet, but it seemed to be moving

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Me and 3 friends were outside talking and heard what appeared to be a jet like noise from the sky, looked up and seen a triangle shaped object that was way lower in altitude than we would've expected this jet to be. it was moving south in direction at a relatively slow but steady pace. the whistle or whine it was making was not loud at all comparing to what height it was at and the size of the object itself. i would guess it to span 50'-75' across. wasn't my first sighting,these things are really wicked sounding and can get really low in speed without loss of altitude.
content.summary: Me and 3 other guys heard a jet like sound but at low volume in the sky and spotted a triangle shaped ufo with 3-4 lights headed due south around the columbia airport around 500-1000 feet about the ground.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on the porch smoking a cigarette when i noticed a single green-whitish fireball like streak of light shoot across the sky then broke off into a perfectly and identical version of itself, tail and color all matching the fireball. there was an airplane i had been staring at in the distance that was there before, during and after the event. the plane seemed as if it was going to land initially and after the event, rose higher into the sky and continued to fly until it was far over and past my house. i live less than ten minutes away from an airport and see events, objects, etc on a weekly basis but this was something i'd never seen... a green-white fireball was in the close vicinity from the ground to the sky, maybe 500-700 ft possibly, maybe 100 ft. above tree line.
content.summary: Sitting on porch, see a green-whitish shooting starlike fireball appear and break into two balls flying symetrically and perfectly alongside one another

content.detailedDescription: I looked up because i saw a bright light like a headlight in the sky.  i watched it.  it sped up really fast leaving a trail that looked like glitter.  then it disappeared.  i was out walking my dog.
content.summary: Thought it was a plane

content.detailedDescription: Walking my dog at 10:15pm last night on 1-11-16 there were a few stars were out. i noticed a flat shape with a slight boomerang line glowing bluish green that seemed to know that i noticed it. it was not a star! while walking back in i stopped and stared at it. immediately it started coming toward me. i had to look away to adjust my dog in my arms it seemed to pull back from its descent toward me. when i looked at it again it came back toward me. i thought to myself...Yes i see you. it seemed to answer with pulsing lights and in my head i heard..We see you too and know you see us. it seemed happy. pulsing yellow orange lights with a very dark blue halo that extended out for quite a circumference with a thin red halo on the exterior of the dark blue halo. i felt my dog shiver and knew i could not stay outside longer. i thought..I hate to leave and it seemed to say, yes we hate you must go too. it had bluish green color and orangy red lights and flashed yellow. it knew my thoughts and communicated telepathically. i am certain about every part of this episode.I came home today and drew it so i would not forget any of it. i hope to experience it again! everything i felt was positive.
content.summary: I went  walk my dog at apprx.10:15pm. noticed a couple of stars out but this was no star. it was a straight line w/ slight boomerang shape. it flashed at me.

content.detailedDescription:
Location: lavergne tennessee
road: burkett road

i was driving home from work, it was approximately 740-745 pm cst. i saw a low set of extremely bright lights. i initially thought it was a very low flying plane. but as i got closer to it, i saw that was not moving like a plane, but was hovering over a house about 30 feet from the road and 10 or 20 feet above the house. 

the object didn't move or was moving very slowly. i know that others on the road had to see the same thing i saw because they was slowing down as well. 

the object appeared to be triangular in shape. the lights on the outer most points was extremely bright white light. i've not seen any planes that have landing lights on that come close to how bright they are. 

under side of the object had 3 triangular housing, with orb shaped lights inside. these was not the same brightness as the ones on the tips of the object. the coloring was an off white color. the object made no audible sounds, so i know that if this was a low flying plane i would have heard the engines. 

my initial reaction was, am i really seeing this thing in the sky. feels very surreal when you see something that you can not identify as a plane, helicopter, or other known vehicle. i'm a strong believer in getting information out, and that is why i'm here. hopefully there will be others who report the same thing i saw. 

i lost sight as i continued driving down the road, i turned around at the next road. by the time i got back to the house the object was gone. wish i could have gotten pictures or video, this thing was amazing.
content.summary: Black triangular shape. extremely bright white lights on the outer points, 3 triangular shaped light housing under the craft.

content.detailedDescription: I was about 7 years old when i looked out the bedroom window. it was dark outside but the sky was clear. i saw a bright red orange, thin oval in shape. the object appeared suddenly out of the sky. it descended down to just over the tree line, hovered for awhile. it then moved in a straight line for approximately 100 yards hovered awhile there then descended slowly behind the trees. i remember being very perplexed as to what just happened.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: I was about 7 when i saw a bright red orange object desend from the sky. i looked out the window. the object hovered for awhile, moved above the tree line, hovered for awhile again, then slowly desended down behind the trees

content.detailedDescription:
Same as above, then these orange glowing orbs, disc shaped crafts, arranged into triangular formation. one at a time, each space craft moved very, very, quickly into space. they changed direction at speeds which no aircraft i know of could possible do. soon, more crafts came. they did the same as the others. then the last grouping of crafts formed a straight line, one at a time. forming a line looking like that which i have seen arraged in the formation of the pyramids in eygypt. they eventually lined up in a perfectly straight line, and all went out at very rapid speeds into space in the direction of orions belt. my son used his starmap app to find out this information. after the last orange orb lanched into space we noticed a black blob of cloud like matter moving very slowly across the tops of the houses in our neighborhood. this happened emediately after the last orb was out of sight in space. we continued to film the black cloud like object. it looked like a "demon" as my son stated. i believed it was a cloaking device. we continued to film the object, which eventually decended below the treetop levels and appeared to land within a few blocks from our house. when we looked at the film, we both realized the craft which was behind the black cloaking device was in fact very clearly a space craft. it was clearly visable. we were completely amazed to find the spacecraft was completely visable. every detail can be seen clearly. even the windows, the markings, the lights, the craft is so completely seen it is unlike anything i have ever seen in any program, show, news report, program, etc. what we have is the best evidence i have seen in my life.  when filmed, the cloak, the black cloud, until it was no longer there. we have very clear, concise, accurate, real time, documentation, of both the frontal, side, and rear views of this spacecraft. at one point, you can clearly see the craft coming out of the picture. in other words, the stop frame shows half of the craft visable; and the other side of the craft divided by a straight line, where half of the vehicle is covered in the cloud, cloaking device, and the other is visably coming out of the black cluod cover. these real time digital images are so clear you can see the front, side, and rear views of the space craft. when you blow up the image you can see the windows on the side of the craft, the markings on the craft, and a clear picture of the face of what many people describe as a grey alien. you can see beams of different colored lights emminating from the craft. there are no wings, no landing gear visable, and this spacecraft made no sound. it is clearly not a drone. our pictures, videos, are so clear, so complete, you can prove without any doubt that what we have is a real, moment-by-moment, documentaion of the entire actual event as it happened. the digital images can be enhanced; an will provide the best evidence of ufo sighting and documentaion i believe that have ever been shown. we are very afraid. we have backed up all of our evidences on numerous devices, we have provided these evidences to numerous people, and they will become public if anything should happen to either myself, or my son, or any of our family members. these digital recordings we have, have been shown to numerous others. they all cannot believe how accurate, clear, and distinctly, this evidence  provides proof of some type of ufo, spacecraft, government, or extraterrestrial vehicle. never-the-less, we really need your help in getting this information out to the public once- and-for-all. we truly believe we have the smoking gun that everyone has been seeking. we want this information out to the public, but we want to remain safe from government intervention. we have ensured our safety. all of the information will be made public if anything should happen to either one of us. please help us...! we are very fearful because of the proof we have. there were documented reports in our local news program channel 17 news in bakersfield ca. it only stated that someone gave them a picture of one single glowing orb in the sky. this is not at all what happened. we have frame by frame documentation with the very best digital cameras on the market. again, we have numerous back-ups, which have been given to many people and cannot be stopped from going public should anything happen to either one of us or our family members. we decided to seek your help first, then go public. we need to state, these crafts came from a location from the east. this happens to be a location where there is a very secretive military base here in california. never-the-less, this evidence will prove the existence of some spacecrafts that are beyond anything known publicly. please contact me at 661-863-7799. we are very willing to share all that we have, know, saw, and witnessed. after the sighting, we tried to track the landing sight. we drove to different locations and eventually know where we believe it landed. we will show you that location and our thoughts on what happed to the craft at a later date. the location would be very easy to hide the craft and move it by rail very quickly by the government. i believe this craft was dispatched, ejected, or abandoning its main ship, because of some type of failure. the other crafts were tracking, following, and staying with this craft, to ensure it safely landed, before they left. the craft that landed looked different from the others. why was it cloaked. when seen by the naked eye? it was invisable to the naked eye. when we viewed it on our digital cameras, it is clear, detailed, and can bee so clearly seen, one whould have to woder what type of technology could make this craft. i have 2 ba degrees, i am in a masters program at my local university, i have my teaching credentials, and both my son and i are both college students who are reasoned, well educated, and completely sound minded. the government would have a very difficult time discrediting a 4.0 graduate student with numerous honor awards and scholorships. we both want the world to know these crafts, beings, events, are real, and truly happened. we want this documented event to be made public, with are safety, and our families safty assured. again, we have taken numerous steps to ensure this does happen. please contact us a.S. a. p. and we both will provide you with all of our evidences once contacted and proper verification of your credentials are assured. please note, i do not give you permission to use our evidences until we are assured you will do what is in our, and the publics, best interest. once we are assured you are who you say you are, and will do the right thing, then will will gladly agree to allow you full discression to disperse our documentation, and evidence to the public. most importantly, that you will ensure our safety.

thank you,

me.
content.distance: 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile, Unknown
content.features: Window(s), Patterned Surface, Insignia, Appendage(s), Other, Unknown
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: First observed as orbs coming from the east. my son and i were bbq'ing in the back-yard. we saw these orange glowing orbs coming from the east rapidly coming towards us. they began various formation changes. triangular. then moved and went into space.

content.detailedDescription: I am a school teacher and my dad is retired us army. we are both credible people. we were out at a park flying our drone. because we were both looking up, we both immediately caught site of a silver ball-like object reflecting the sun from the west. the object was zig zagging through the sky. it was moving quickly. we have lived on military bases most of our lives and know our military aircraft. what we witnessed today was no aircraft we know about. furthermore, there is no object we know of that can move effortlessly like the one we saw. we both yelled wtf is that. do you see that object? it was present for a short time and then disappeared. the sky was cloudless. the object looked like a piece of solid titanium. it was very reflective.
content.summary: Silver ball object zig zagging over our heads

content.detailedDescription:
My friends and i were out behind my home, playing a game in the dark where we use a flashlight to find each other, kind of like hide and seek but in the dark. by the time of the sighting, only one other friend was still outside with me, while the rest went back inside as the temperature was getting pretty chilly. we were both standing between two bushes in the garden behind the house, looking out at the stars, since my friend would soon be leaving town to move to a larger community and this was essentially our goodbye for the next little while. 

i initially noticed the object, since the paranormal has been a large part of my life and anything unusual in the sky will immediately get my notice. more so, i'm used to how the sky looks behind my home, and this didn't match the regular stars in the sky.

when i first noticed the object, it looked like a star, except it was travelling northwards at a slow pace, which obviously stars don't do. soon, i realized it wasn't a star, or a satellite, because as soon as it reached directly in front of us, it stopped. i pointed this out to my friend, who seemed transfixed on the object, and as i turned back to look at it, it blinked and grew to the size of a basketball, if i held it out as far as i could with one hand. i was suddenly very afraid, but i couldn't move my eyes away from the object. i was seeing a ufo, after all, something i had always wanted (next to a bigfoot sighting or sea serpent, at least at the time). 

after what seemed like 4 or 5 minutes, the object vanished, or blinked away, as it disappeared from our sight completely. there was no trace left behind, and it hasn't been seen in the same part of the sky since.

my friend initially confirmed what we had seen the night of the sighting, but within a few days vehemently denied seeing the same thing as me, and continues to to this day. i know exactly what i saw in the sky, and while i admit that i was scared of being abducted as i went to bed that night, i wish i could see it again.
content.summary: Unknown ball of light traveled through sky, stopped, grew to basketball size, then vanished, at night with friends

content.detailedDescription: I went outside on my deck around 4am for a smoke and i see what i first thought might have been a meterior   a blue sphere shape with a short white tail. it zipped past a opening of trees and went be hide the trees. and then gone. i was waiting to see if their might be an explosion on impact. cause it was so close and their have been something  like the one that happen in russia last year. it was kinda like that. but this one was cleaner looking    i did some math trying to figure out how big this was. and figure where i was standig and where it was. it would have to be about 60 feet round   i have seen many things in the sky that are explain. this one is new to me   now i can't stop thinking about this
content.summary: Blue sphere. white tail. no sound. traveling fast

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were sitting in our campsite at twin shores campground in pei.  my wife was facing me and it moved into her field of view over my shoulder and she yelled "what is that?" and pointed at it. i had no idea what it was, it looked like the sun at sunset but you could look right at it without it bothering you. i hold a commercial pilot license so have a pretty good grasp of heights and speeds of objects in the sky. it moved across from the right of the sky to the left and decelerated at a perfect constant rate then stopped. i would say it was about 500 ft in the sky and was probably 5 times wider than a cessna 172 which would be over 180 feet across. after it stopped moving it took off directly away from us and moved up in the sky at a 45 degree angle until it disappeared from view. this thing was moving very fast. i have never seen anything like it. notice the smaller circle at the top. 

we were both not afraid more mesmerized than anything.

unfortuantely i zoomed in too tight to get a comaprison of the tree tops etc.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Orange bright object moving across the trees and then took off into the sky at twin shores campground

content.detailedDescription: A few nights ago i was conducting a google maps sweep of the desert near area 51 s4. i found what looked to be like underground hangers opening up, and i saw a glowing ball of light flying around the opening. inside the openings it appeared there were two others inside the openings.
content.summary: Was checing out area 51 near s4 found this. google maps.

content.detailedDescription: I left the bar at approxinamtely 2:30 in an inebriated state. i got in my car and proceeded north towards moonbeam. i stopped to relieve myself and looked up to find this amazing sight in front of me, no more than 20 ft away. i was dumbstruck and so startled i tinkled all over my pants. i quickly got back in my car and raced home to afraid to tell anyone for fear of being laughed at and/or repercussions from the visitors. once i found this sight, i felt comfortable re-telling this harrowing account. for more information please contact me. i have a couple photos on my phone if you are interested.
content.summary: Round grey object with approx 5 windows, 4 short legs

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way to the car with my girlfriend, when we suddenly saw a bright moving light up in te sky. it wasn't an airplane and it sure wasn't a satelite. this object was changing speed constantly (from fast to slow to fast, etc.) and wasn't moving in a straight line. luckely we caught it on camera!
content.summary: Bright light ball shoot in a flash to space

content.detailedDescription: There was a fire ball nd i is very scared so i called me mom and he told me to kall the plice so i does. the plice said its just a plain but i now that it was a alian. so know im is goin ta call the miltray an get they to say me that is an ufo alian. i lose site after tha bal swim awy in tha ski.
content.summary: I see fir bal in tha ski shapped lik a aple
